name: Foody the Robot (Ludum Dare 51)
description:
The game is about a robot named Foody the Robot who needs to learn to remember random product lists and repeat them within 10 seconds.

There is an AI and a narrator that guides You trough the journey. The narrator might a bit evil....

This is a game made for Ludum Dare 51 with the theme - Every 10 seconds.

!!! Game might have some bugs on WIN,  LOOSE states, sorry, don't be mad :)

The game has 8 levels, It will take some practice and a lot of skill to do them all, but if You are able to do 6 You must consider Your self a winner, if You do 8 You are immortal.

How to play:

  • Listen to instructions;
  • Press space to roll the dice to generate the shopping list (You will see dice on the screen when it's time;
  • Use LMB to click on the items You rolled within 10 seconds;
  • Wait for next LEVEL, if You succeed;
  • Repeat 8 times.
